decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted SH1 (Proposed Elevations), SH2 (Proposed Ground Floor Plan), SH3 (Existing Ground Floor Plan), SH4 (Existing and Proposed Site Plan)  Received: 17/03/2016 therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the outbuilding hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - The outbuilding hereby approved shall not be used for purposes other than those incidental to the enjoyment of the application property and shall not be used as primary accommodation such as a living room, bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, study or as a separate unit of accommodation.
description: Erection of detached outbuilding in rear garden for use as garden room
